import React from 'react'; import './bootstrap.min.css'; import classes from './Account.module.css' import icon from './google-logo-9808.png' import can from './red-trash-can-icon.png' import plus from './plus-sign.png' import addPic from './circle.png' import DragAndDrop from './DragAndDrop/DragAndDrop' export default function Profile(){ return(

Customize profile

PROFILE INFORMATION

Display name (optional)

Set a display name. This does not change your username.

About (optional)

Set a display name. This does not change your username.

Social links (5 max)

People who visit your profile will see your social links.

Add social link

IMAGES

Profile picture and banner image

Images must be .png or .jpg format

Connect to Apple

Connect account to log in to Reddit with Apple

Connect With Apple

Connect to Google

BETA TESTS

) }
